remarks.para: Types or members that are marked with the attribute can be accessed by partially trusted types and members. These partially trusted types and members can be within any assembly that is marked with the or (APTCA) attribute, or they are partially trusted for other reasons, such as being loaded into partial trust. Code that is marked with the must be subject to a rigorous security audit to ensure that it can be used safely in a secure execution environment. Security-safe-critical code must validate the permissions of callers to determine whether they have authority to access protected resources used by the code.

summary.para: Identifies types or members as security-critical and safely accessible by transparent code.
